modName: Enter the Soul Cairn - An alternate Way
summary: This is a mod for those, who can't enter the Soul Cairn after the Main Quest or it doesn't open.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod for those, who can't enter the Soul Cairn after the Main Quest or it doesn't open.

The portal is in your Home in Solitude, Proudspire Manor.

You don't have to be a vampire to use this mod!

[color=red]Dawnguard has to be installed! [/color]


(Maybe you can Enter the Soul Cairn (after you enter it the first time at the Main Quest) on the normal Way, but I don't know it because i have (maybe) a bug there: the Entry for the Soul Cairn is Closed, and I can't open it - so I made this mod)
author: bemme1233
